thread.title_full: Gannon University Awarded Million-Dollar U.S. Dept. Of Education Grant (Gannon University) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Gannon University Awarded Million-Dollar U.S. Dept. Of Education Grant (Gannon University)
text: ( Source : Gannon University ) Posted: October 16 , 2015 Gannon University has been awarded a Student Support Services ( SSS ) grant from the U.S. Department of Education . The award is a renewal of a $ 1.1 million, five-year grant originally
